section.title: Tracers
section.para: Example declares single tracer: javax.slee.SbbNotification [service=ServiceID[name=USSD Sip Train Scheduler,vendor=org.mobicents, version=1.0],sbb=SbbID[name=USSDSipSbb,vendor=org.mobicents, version=1.0]].SipUSSDSbb

important.para: Spaces where introduced to render page correctly. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.title: Alarms
section.para: This example does not rise any alarms.
